title: The Golden Sayings of Epictetus - LXII
author: Unknown
content:
No labour, according to Diogenes, is good but that which
aims at producing courage and strength of soul rather than of
body.

This complete text of The Golden Sayings of Epictetus is in the public domain.


Also see Epictetus: A Stoic and Socratic Guide to Life
by A. A. Long.
